components.name: Wheel Hub Assembly
components.function: Connects the wheel to the vehicle's drive train

components.name: Brake Drum or Disc
components.function: Slows or stops the vehicle by applying friction to the rotating wheel

components.name: Axle Assembly
components.function: Transmits torque from the differential to the wheels

components.name: Steering Knuckle
components.function: Connects the wheel assembly, suspension, and steering system components
